directions.step:
1) Mix BBQ and Horseradish sauce together
2) Grill one side of the salmon on a well oiled grill
3) After turning over baste cooked side with sauce mixture.
4) Before taking off the grill flip again and baste the other side of the fish
Suggested Wine: A berry lager or sweet red wine
NOTES : Try this sauce on skewered shrimp or other types of seafood.
Recipe by: Red Lobster
